game_description: Prison Boss VR is a crafting and simulation game with one simple goal: make cash! Locked up in your prison cell, produce and sell contraband items to buy your freedom back. But don‚Äôt get caught by the guards! Crafting at night‚Ä¶ Roll cigarettes, fill up bottles, write erotic letters, and more! Be sure to stash your goods well, or they will be seized by the patrolling guards! ‚Ä¶Trading during the day Sell all the products of your hard illegal work to your fellow inmates. You can also use them to complete special jobs to earn reputation along with useful rewards! Key Features: ‚Ä¢ Unlock 11 craftable items ‚Ä¢ Complete 80 jobs across 4 different prisons ‚Ä¢ Play the game in Story, Arcade or Boss mode ‚Ä¢ Customize your cell by adding new furniture ‚Ä¢ Adapt your cell to the size of your VR playspace ‚Ä¢ Jazz along our awesome soundtrack ‚Ä¢ Make mama proud But most importantly, become the Prison Boss and get your way out of this hole!
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (Belgium), French (Canada), French (France), Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Spain)

review_2: This game is very very fun I highly recommend it. This game is my favorite game currently and this game is decently long but I enjoyed every part of this game. I hope they make prison boss 2 in the future and multiplayer with that to play with you‚Äôre friends and more prisons to play.
review_3: https://bit ly/3NdNCKg Change the Space to a . Prison Boss VR offers a unique and engaging take on the simulation genre, immersing players into the gritty world of prison life. As a virtual inmate, you'll be tasked with crafting and trading items to survive and thrive behind bars. The game's captivating mechanics, such as crafting contraband in your cell and interacting with fellow inmates, create a sense of immersion and strategy that's both challenging and rewarding. The minimalist and cartoonish art style gives the game a lighthearted feel, which contrasts intriguingly with the prison setting. The freedom to customize and decorate your cell adds a personal touch to the experience, allowing you to truly make it your own. However, some players might wish for more variety in activities and interactions, as well as additional challenges to keep the gameplay fresh over time. Prison Boss VR manages to turn a seemingly mundane setting into an engaging and enjoyable virtual reality escapade. It's a game that encourages creativity, resourcefulness, and quick thinking, making it a great choice for those who enjoy strategy and management games with a twist. If you're looking for a novel and immersive VR experience that offers a taste of prison life without the real-life consequences, Prison Boss VR is definitely worth a look.
review_4: If you're having problems like I did at first here are a few tips gods guards cannot see contraband if it's behind something if something is behind for example a bin the guard won't be able to see it the second tip if you are having problems with you going out of bound try calibrating it in the settings or try to switch to room guardian or stationary if your already in room tip number 3 always have a backup plan for example if you can make alcohol always have enough resources to make more for example if you only need three for a quest it gets enough resources to make five that five if you get caught you still have two two get money back tip number four always make the highest priced item for example alcohol or cake when you get a chance but overall 10 out of 10 game I love it
